Posted By: psychguy (6/3/2009 7:36:37 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: People seem to be terribly harsh to Lilliana Vess so I feel I should offer an alternative view! I've found various good uses for her. I tend to use her first ability as another way to help Vulturous Zombie on its way to being gigantic. I agree with the view that her tutor ability is somewhat frustrating as you usually have to wait till your next draw for you card but a tutor is a tutor nonetheless and I'm not going to complain at a repeatable one! Yes, I know, her final ability is virtually never going to happen but I've made it happen once and it put a f\*\*\*ing big smile on my face when it did! So don't be a tournament snob and berate her because she's not going to win you any top-prizes; she's fun and nasty in a casual environment and that's good enough for me!
posts.html:
People seem to be terribly harsh to Lilliana Vess so I feel I should offer an alternative view! I've found various good uses for her. I tend to use her first ability as another way to help Vulturous Zombie on its way to being gigantic. I agree with the view that her tutor ability is somewhat frustrating as you usually have to wait till your next draw for you card but a tutor is a tutor nonetheless and I'm not going to complain at a repeatable one! Yes, I know, her final ability is virtually never going to happen but I've made it happen once and it put a f***ing big smile on my face when it did! So don't be a tournament snob and berate her because she's not going to win you any top-prizes; she's fun and nasty in a casual environment and that's good enough for me!

Posted By: SkinnyO (2/11/2009 5:31:57 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I have to agree with Asinine-Ultimatum. (How funny it is to agree with someone who is "asinine".^\_^)  
  
A *very* decent first ability! I can't ***fathom*** why people seem to think that this is bad? Yes she does cost 5 to bring out . . . and 5cc for discard 1 card ***does*** suck (if that is the only thing that spell does) . . . but at that point in the game (in an aggressive format, or if your thing is discard) they don't have many cards in their hand . . . and a continual -1 to their hand is vicious when supported with other cards.  
  
Her second ability is *nice*. A continual tutor effect!? (Yes it **would** be better as an instant, but isn't *everything* better as an instant?) Black tutors stuff. It's what it does. And her continual tutor can give you just what you need when you need it. (And isn't it really similar to [Diabolic Tutor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Diabolic Tutor) because you often don't play the card you tutor up that turn?)  
  
Her last... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

Her second ability is nice. A continual tutor effect!? (Yes it would be better as an instant, but isn't everything better as an instant?) Black tutors stuff. It's what it does. And her continual tutor can give you just what you need when you need it. (And isn't it really similar to Diabolic Tutor because you often don't play the card you tutor up that turn?)

Posted By: Queen_of_the_Fae (2/12/2009 6:03:44 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I'm not a m\*\*\*ive fan of any of the planeswalkers, but I downright dislike the Villainess. I have literally not once seen her justify her mana cost or deck slot. In my experience she just doesn't work out in play as anything other than a not-tremendously-efficient tutor.  
  
@ Asinine-Ultimatum: I do feel the need to point out that I'm not a tournament player, and in fact quit playing in tournaments over five years ago. I've only seen her final ability go off a handful of times in casual play, and even then, you really need either a deck dedicated to abusing the ability or to be playing in a large multiplayer game, otherwise it's still not as big a deal as it feels like it ought to be. Very few of the Planeswalkers actually make that much of a difference on the board in my experience, but if you *can* get their ultimate off, that's usually a huge deal. Liliana's has never really worked out in games I've played or watched. Be it a board sweeper, or the opponent having enough defenders... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:

@ Asinine-Ultimatum: I do feel the need to point out that I'm not a tournament player, and in fact quit playing in tournaments over five years ago. I've only seen her final ability go off a handful of times in casual play, and even then, you really need either a deck dedicated to abusing the ability or to be playing in a large multiplayer game, otherwise it's still not as big a deal as it feels like it ought to be. Very few of the Planeswalkers actually make that much of a difference on the board in my experience, but if you can get their ultimate off, that's usually a huge deal. posts.post_content: vess is ok, but thats the most i can give her. her +1 of making an opponent discard a card... they'll keep getting rid of cards they dont need. -2, tutor, that is probably lilianas best ability in the long run, your creatures will do more than she will. her last ability... well the game will be one sided by the time you use it, or it wont do much if you use it when most finishers do make a differense. only if you synenergy with jace berlin will she be very good. this planeswalker could be way better.
